data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Rheinland-Pfalz.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rheinland-Pfalz, Germany

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Rheinland-Pfalz, Germany.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 4,012,700 people living in the state of Rheinland-Pfalz.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Rheinland-Pfalz, Germany from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, Danish-speaking people.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Rheinland-Pfalz to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 83,632 believers in the state of Rheinland-Pfalz to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.section_summary:
the state of Rheinland-Pfalz, Germany has a population of 4,012,700.

We estimate Rheinland-Pfalz has 83,632 people who might know Jesus, 2,374,579 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,554,489 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 47 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 4,012,700 people living in Rheinland-Pfalz through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.
